body_html: @bazinac Can you try quantization with both quantize_weights and quantize_nodes? I'm still investigation but adding quantize_nodes to the mix seems to yields much better results. The eight-bit-calculations instructions are up-to-date.
body_text: @bazinac Can you try quantization with both quantize_weights and quantize_nodes? I'm still investigation but adding quantize_nodes to the mix seems to yields much better results. The eight-bit-calculations instructions are up-to-date.
body: @bazinac Can you try quantization with both quantize_weights *and* quantize_nodes? I'm still investigation but adding quantize_nodes to the mix seems to yields much better results. The [eight-bit-calculations](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/tools/graph_transforms/#eight-bit-calculations) instructions are up-to-date.
